title: Ola Electric to open next purchase window for S1 Pro scooter on March 17, 18
description: The company is currently ramping up the production and deliveries of the Ola S1 Pro scooter to meet the overwhelming customer demand, the Bhavish Aggarwal-led company stated.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
